In England, in the seven days to 16 April, there were 13,979 new confirmed cases (24.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 April, there were 16,216 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 14% (2,237 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 April is 3,840,945 (6,823.9 cases per 100,000 population).
